005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008/**
009 * MPST: Exceptions related to the Metapath static context and static
010 * evaluation.
011 */
012@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
013public class StaticMetapathException
014    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
015  /**
016   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0003">err:MPST0003</a>: It
017   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
018   * error</a> if an expression is not a valid instance of the Metapath grammar.
019   */
020  // TODO: need a Metapath grammar link
021  public static final int INVALID_PATH_GRAMMAR = 3;
022
023  /**
024   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0008">err:MPST0008</a>: It
025   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
026   * error</a> if an expression refers to an element name, attribute name, schema
027   * type name, namespace prefix, or variable name that is not defined in the
028   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-context">static
029   * context</a>, except for an ElementName in an <a href=
030   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#doc-xpath31-ElementTest">ElementTest</a> or
031   * an AttributeName in an <a href=
032   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#doc-xpath31-AttributeTest">AttributeTest</a>.
033   */
034  public static final int NOT_DEFINED = 8;
035  /**
036   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0010">err:MPST0010</a>: An
037   * implementation that does not support the namespace axis must raise a
038   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static error</a> if
039   * it encounters a reference to the namespace axis and XPath 1.0 compatibility
040   * mode is false.
041   */
042  public static final int AXIS_NAMESPACE_UNSUPPORTED = 10;
043
044  /**
045   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0017">err:MPST0017</a>: It
046   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
047   * error</a> if the
048   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-expanded-qname">expanded
049   * QName</a> and number of arguments in a static function call do not match the
050   * name and arity of a
051   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-known-func-signatures">function
052   * signature</a> in the
053   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-context">static
054   * context</a>.
055   */
056  public static final int NO_FUNCTION_MATCH = 17;
057
058  /**
059   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0051">err:MPST0051</a>: It
060   * is a static error if the
061   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-expanded-qname">expanded
062   * QName</a> for an AtomicOrUnionType in a SequenceType is not defined in the
063   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-is-types">in-scope schema
064   * types</a> as a <a href=
065   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-generalized-atomic-type">generalized
066   * atomic type</a>.
067   */
068  public static final int UNKNOWN_TYPE = 51;
069
070  /**
071   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0052">err:MQST0052</a>: The
072   * type named in a cast or castable expression must be the name of a type
073   * defined in the <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-is-types">in-scope
074   * schema types</a>, and the type must be simple.
075   */
076  public static final int CAST_UNKNOWN_TYPE = 52;
077
078  /**
079   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0070">err:MQST0070</a>: A
080   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static error</a> is
081   * raised if any of the following conditions is statically detected in any
082   * expression.
083   * <ul>
084   * <li>The prefix xml is bound to some namespace URI other than
085   * http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace.</li>
086   * <li>A prefix other than xml is bound to the namespace URI
087   * http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace.</li>
088   * <li>The prefix xmlns is bound to any namespace URI.</li>
089   * <li>A prefix other than xmlns is bound to the namespace URI
090   * http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/.</li>
091   * </ul>
092   */
093  public static final int NAMESPACE_MISUSE = 70;
094
095  /**
096   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0080">err:MPST0080</a>: It
097   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
098   * error</a> if the target type of a cast or castable expression is
099   * meta:anyAtomicType.
100   */
101  public static final int CAST_ANY_ATOMIC = 80;
102
103  /**
104   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0070">err:MPST0070</a>: It
105   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
106   * error</a> if a QName used in an expression contains a namespace prefix that
107   * cannot be expanded into a namespace URI by using the
108   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-namespaces">statically
109   * known namespaces</a>.
110   */
111  public static final int PREFIX_NOT_EXPANDABLE = 81;
112
113  /**
114   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0134">err:MPST0134</a>: The
115   * namespace axis is not supported.
116   */
117  public static final int AXIS_NAMESPACE_UNSUPPORTED_IN_TEST = 134;
118
119  /**
120   * the serial version UID.
121   */
122  private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
123
124  /**
125   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
126   * and {@code cause}.
127   *
128   * @param code
129   *          the error code value
130   * @param message
131   *          the exception message
132   * @param cause
133   *          the original exception cause
134   */
135  public StaticMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
136    super(code, message, cause);
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
141   * and no cause.
142   *
143   * @param code
144   *          the error code value
145   * @param message
146   *          the exception message
147   */
148  public StaticMetapathException(int code, String message) {
149    super(code, message);
150  }
151
152  /**
153   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
154   * the {@code cause}.
155   *
156   * @param code
157   *          the error code value
158   * @param cause
159   *          the original exception cause
160   */
161  public StaticMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
162    super(code, cause);
163  }
164
165  @Override
166  public String getCodePrefix() {
167    return "MPST";
168  }
169
170}
